root.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012
root.description: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012 (Also known as PES 12, Pro Evo 12 and Winning Eleven 12) is the latest addition to the Pro Evolution Soccer series. All the games in the series have been developed and published by Konami.Like the PES games before, PES12 has got exclusive UEFA, UEFA Champions Leagua, UEFA Europa League, UEFA Super Cup and Copa Libertadores licences. La Liga BBVA will be fully lisenced in PES12.Following user feedback, PES 12 will bring big improvements in animation, visuals and AI to make it more realistic experience. Similarly, they made a lot of improvements to how the game moves and feels. According to Konami, players will be able to replicate anything they see in the real-world games. PES 2012 will feature mode from previous years such as Master League and Become a Legend. There will also be a mode new to the series called 'Club Boss' where the player will take the position as the owner of a football club.Because FIFA has been domination football sim world in the last three or four years, Konami has been focusing on ensuring the highest level of playability, challenge and realism for the game.Pro Evolution Soccer 2012 will be released this Autumn for PC, XBOX360, PS3, Wii, PSP and PS2.
